question: India has received the first shipment through “Inland Water Trade and Transit” route from which country?
explanation:
India has received the first commercial shipment from Bangladesh to Karimganj, Assam via the “Protocol for Inland Water Trade and Transit” (PIWTT) route.
The Protocol for Inland Water Trade & Transit (PIWTT) was signed between India and Bangladesh in 1972 to provide inland waterways connectivity between the two countries.
